Text:
Title....: Black Christmas
IMDb......: http://imdblight.com/id/a0UgPnlyMgRifXQE-Black_Christmas
Genres...: Horror, Thriller
Year.....: 2006
Rating...: 4.4/10 with 3,118 ratings
Plot.....: A remake of the 1974 horror movie Black Christmas. The movie tells the story about Billy, a young boy who was abused by his mother as a child. While his mother was cheating on Billy's father, she eventually killed his father and kept Billy in the attic - for good, while she was with her lover and starting a "new" family. As Billy's mother fell pregnant with a daughter and treated her with love, which Billy had never experienced with his mother, Billy came out of the attic after years and brutally murdered his mother and her lover. Cut to present day, a group of eight sorority sisters consisting of Kelli (Katie Cassidy), Dana (Lacey Chabert), Lauren (Crystal Lowe), Megan (Jessica Harmon), Claire (Leela Savasta), Heather (Mary Elizabeth Winstead), Megan (Jessica Harmon) and Melissa (Michelle Trachtenberg) and their house mother (Andrea Martin),who now live in Billy's childhood home, find themselves being harassed by threatening and intimidating mystery phone-calls during Christmas Break and as one of the girls goes missing, the girls begin being murdered one by one by no other than Billy...
Filmed in: Canada
Language.: English

Kan ngn seeda?

Can sombody seed? Plz. max 2houers.

This movie was disturbing. I've seen about everything, but this was just oddly disturbing! One theme rang true, one we have seen in many movies like this : those who are ON tv don't actually own or watch a tv! LOL Ok, so it is a bit predictable, but the filming was good, the music will keep your teeth on edge and you will be entertained... Michelle fans will be sadly disappointed, I know I was... but it is a fairly creepy ride, sort of following the Halloween storyline. I didn't see the '74 version, I just love Mitchie!
